Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 95 off 104 balls
Daryl Mitchell scored an unbeaten 130 off 127 balls
Mohammed Shami took 5 wickets for 54 runs
India won by 4 wickets with 12 balls remaining
Post-Match Reflections: Mohammed Shami was named Man of the Match
Daryl Mitchell was named Cricinfo's MVP
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 20 overs per side
India defended 10 runs in the final over to win by 1 run
